description: This is an ESLint configuration file written in JavaScript, specifically configuring linting rules and settings for a TypeScript project using '@typescript-eslint'. It imports external ESLint configurations and plugins, and exports an array of configuration objects specifying ignore patterns, file-specific rules, parser options, and globals.

methods.name: default export
methods.description: Exports an array of ESLint configurations that set up recommended rules, ignore patterns, TypeScript-specific parser options, plugins, and global variables.
